column1: Local Foods////I got the crunchy chicken sandwich on a Pretzel roll. (Ahhh! That's amazing
column2: fresh pretzel roll?!). It was so good. Not quite as I imagined it would look
column3: it's more a chicken salad than a slab. That was fine. Made it easier to eat. I got the quinoa side and chips. Fresh made
column4: on site. Both were good. But the chips were abundant
